promotions.pdp_message: Buy 2 get 1 free on Fortnite toys
promotions.legal_disclaimer_text: Buy 2 get a 3rd free on select Fornite toys. Add all items to cart to receive discount. Discount applied at checkout. Not valid on previous orders. Lowest-priced item will be free. Offer excludes items sold & shipped by Target Plusâ„¢ Partners and clearance items. Quantities limited. Discount not applicable to gift wrap, tax, or shipping and handling charges. If a qualifying item in your order is returned, refund value will be reduced by the prorated discount amount of the item. Pricing, promotions and availability may vary by location and on Target.com. Offer expires 7/6/2019 at 11:59pm PT.
Save 5% on subscription orders. Discount applied in cart at checkout. Discount not applicable to gift wrap, tax, or shipping and handling charges. May not be applied to previous orders.
